metadata.publisher: A Paris : De l'Imprimerie de Monsieur
metadata.description: Prospectus for French translation of Sparrman's "Resa till Goda Hopps-udden"

"Cet ouvrage se vend à Paris, chez Buisson, libraire, Hôtel de Mesgrigny, rue des Poitevins; il forme trois vol. in 8° ... imprimés par M. Didot le jeune sur beau caractère de Cicero neuf ... Et deux vol. in-4° ... imprimés sur beau caractère de S. Augustin neuf"--P. 1
Includes prospectuses for French translation of John Gillies' "The history of ancient Greece" and for François Soulés' "Histoire des troubles de l'Amérique anglaise"
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
